entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
